channel.title: Our Team on Zimera Corporation
channel.description: Recent content in Our Team on Zimera Corporation

item.title: Dr. Bambang Purnomosidi D. P.
item.description: Dr. Bambang Purnomosidi D. P. (also known as bpdp) has a wide range of experiences in software industry and education. He is a Ph.D from DTETI - FT UGM.

item.title: Dr. Widyastuti Andriyani
item.description: Dr. Widyastuti Andriyani is a Ph.D from DCSE, FMIPA, UGM. Her expertise are in AI and Expert System.

item.title: Karyani Laksmi Dewi, S.E., M.Si.
item.description: Karyani Laksmi Dewi, S.E., M.Si. has degree from UGM (FEB - Economics) and UI (Master of Science in Management). She has a wide range of experiences and expertise in business development and investor relation.
